Title: business development
email_subject: Connecting with a Fellow Santa Clara University Alum
email_body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is {name}, and I am a {year} {degree} student majoring in {major} at Santa Clara University. I noticed that you have a background in business development at TE2, and I am very interested in pursuing a career in this field.

As a fellow Santa Clara alum, I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to learn from your experiences and insights. If you have 15-20 minutes in the next couple of weeks, I would love to chat about your journey and any advice you might have for someone starting out.

Thank you for considering my request. I look forward to the possibility of connecting!

Best regards,
{name}
